original_text: And the Lord told him: “Listen to all that the people are saying to you; it is not you they have rejected, but they have rejected me as their king.
korean_text: 여호와께서 사무엘에게 이르시되 백성이 네게 한 말을 다 들으라 이는 그들이 너를 버림이 아니요 나를 버려 자기들의 왕이 되지 못하게 함이니라

sentences.original_text: Listen to all that the people are saying to you;
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들이 너에게 말하는 모든 것을 들으라;

sentences.original_text: it is not you they have rejected,
but they have rejected me as their king.
